dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, everyone's raving about Kaspi.kz turning Kazakhstan into some, uh, digital payments utopia. But is it really a revolution, or just another bank, you know, with a shiny app and, uh, good PR?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, everyone's raving about the website turning Kazakhstan into some, uh, digital payments utopia. But is it really a revolution, or just another bank, you know, with a shiny app and, uh, good P R?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, the article highlights their 'crucial contribution' to the burgeoning fintech landscape. I mean, they're actively accelerating the shift to a cashless economy, they say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, the article highlights their 'crucial contribution' to the burgeoning fintech landscape. I mean, they're actively accelerating the shift to a cashless economy, they say.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the founders and President discussed Kaspi.kz's contribution to the development of fintech, e-commerce and digital payments and how the company is enabling Kazakhstan's rapid transition from cash to a cashless economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'Actively accelerating'? Sounds like, uh, they're just pushing their own agenda, B. What about, like, consumer choice? Is this good for everyone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Actively accelerating'? Sounds like, uh, they're just pushing their own agenda, B. What about, like, consumer choice? Is this good for everyone?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're, um, transforming from a leading retail bank into the nation's 'foremost technology platform.' Their goal is to, uh, 'elevate people's living standards' and stimulate economic development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're, um, transforming from a leading retail bank into the nation's 'foremost technology platform.' Their goal is to, uh, 'elevate people's living standards' and stimulate economic development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting we discussed our transformation from a leading retail bank into the country's largest technology platform and mobile ecosystem... We shared our vision on how Kaspi.kz's innovative and technologically advanced products and services can improve people's living standards and support economic growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'Elevate living standards' with an app? Or, uh, just make it easier for them to profit from every single transaction? They're going for an IPO, right? London Stock Exchange, I heard?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Elevate living standards' with an app? Or, uh, just make it easier for them to profit from every single transaction? They're going for an I P O, right? London Stock Exchange, I heard?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The founders of Kaspi.kz also updated the President on Kaspi.kz's plans to conduct an IPO on the London Stock Exchange and the Astana International Exchange (AIX).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's, um, part of their strategic plans. But they've also, uh, supported 12,500 companies, over, um, diverse economic sectors. And, like, 7 million active users on their app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's, um, part of their strategic plans. But they've also, uh, supported twelve thousand, five hundred companies, over, um, diverse economic sectors. And, like, seven million active users on their app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz founders shared the company's plans to continue growing services around its partners, which include over 12 000 companies across various sectors of economy... our hugely popular Kaspi.kz Mobile App, which currently has over 6 million users

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seven million active users. That's, um, a lot for Kazakhstan. Are they truly 'indispensable' or just, like, the only game in town? Sounds a bit monopolistic, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven million active users. That's, um, a lot for Kazakhstan. Are they truly 'indispensable' or just, like, the only game in town? Sounds a bit monopolistic, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but they're providing, uh, merchant financing, 2.2 billion tenge to SMEs in just, uh, two months! And they got a huge three-year income tax holiday for micro businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but they're providing, uh, merchant financing, two point two billion tenge to SMEs in just, uh, two months! And they got a huge three-year income tax holiday for micro businesses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 2 billion tenge has already been provided to SMEs to help fund their growth in just the last two months. Kaspi.kz founders expressed gratitude to the President on behalf of entrepreneurs for providing a 3-year income tax holiday for micro and small businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A tax holiday? So, the government is just, like, subsidizing this 'tech platform' with taxpayer money? For, uh, 'economic prosperity'? Sounds more like corporate welfare to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A tax holiday? So, the government is just, like, subsidizing this 'tech platform' with taxpayer money? For, uh, 'economic prosperity'? Sounds more like corporate welfare to me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's an 'essential investment,' though, I mean, to solidify cashless payments and support small businesses, they said. The President, uh, lauded their innovations, their 'transformative impact.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's an 'essential investment,' though, I mean, to solidify cashless payments and support small businesses, they said. The President, uh, lauded their innovations, their 'transformative impact.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This decision is an important investment that will further support the growth of cashless payments and will provide another important foundation for development of small businesses in Kazakhstan. ... The President noted the importance to the country of the technological innovations continually being pioneered by Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The President lauded them. Of course, he did. So, uh, ultimately, is Kaspi.kz really about, like, transforming the nation, or just, you know, getting rich off, uh, digital transactions and, um, government favors?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The President lauded them. Of course, he did. So, uh, ultimately, is the website really about, like, transforming the nation, or just, you know, getting rich off, uh, digital transactions and, um, government favors?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're, uh, revolutionizing how people transact, shop, and manage finances. It's, um, the most rapid and expansive adoption of cashless payments in all of Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're, uh, revolutionizing how people transact, shop, and manage finances. It's, um, the most rapid and expansive adoption of cashless payments in all of Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Driven by Kaspi.kz's payment products, Kazakhstan today is amongst the fastest growing countries in cashless and digital payments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Rapid adoption, uh-huh. Or maybe, like, forced adoption by a, you know, highly successful and politically connected entity. How much, uh, choice do people really have?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rapid adoption, uh-huh. Or maybe, like, forced adoption by a, you know, highly successful and politically connected entity. How much, uh, choice do people really have?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they've built this 'state-of-the-art' payments infrastructure, you know, 21,000 POS terminals, expanding to, uh, 36,000. It's, um, a huge network.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've built this 'state-of-the-art' payments infrastructure, you know, twenty one thousand P O S terminals, expanding to, uh, thirty six thousand. It's, um, a huge network.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the end of 2019, Kaspi.kz rolled out modern payments infrastructure, including 20 000 POS Terminals and plans to increase this to 35 000 in 2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A huge network that, uh, just further entrenches their control over, like, all the transactions. Sounds less like innovation and more like, you know, a giant digital tollbooth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A huge network that, uh, just further entrenches their control over, like, all the transactions. Sounds less like innovation and more like, you know, a giant digital tollbooth.
